artist: Artist: Francesco Bartolozzi; Artist: After Hans Holbein the Younger
description: round image of a portrait of a little boy with light brown hair, wearing a black cap with a white feather and a black short-sleeved jacket over a shirt with green sleeves and a white collar; boy has his PL arm resting on table; blue ground; square border with brick-like patterning around portrait; text below portrait: "HENRY ELDEST SON of CHARLES BRANDON / DUKE OF SUFFOLK. ob.1551."; text in lower margin: "IN HIS MAJESTY'S COLLECTION. / Published as the Act directs March 26, 1798, by I. Chamerlaine. Brompton. Middlesex."
medium: Etching printed in brown and hand colored
portfolio: From Imitations of Original Drawings by Hans Holbein in the collection of his majesty, for the portraits of illustrious persons of the court of Henry VIII.
signed: below image in the plate: Holbein Pinx.  F. Bartolozzi Sculpt.
title: Henry Eldest Son of Charles Brandon, Duke of Suffolk
